description: 400m elevation gain to cliifs overlooking the Murray Valley and the town of Tumbler Ridge.  The trail is well marked. The cliffs do not have guard rails, watch children and pets carefully.
directions: Head North from Tumbler Ridge 6km on Hwy 29S turning right on the road to Sanctuary Valley. At the large barn take the left fork in the road. The trail head is 1km past the barn.
title: Bergeron Cliffs
